tool_description:
Wave, Weather and Tide Conditions for any spot on the Ocean Surface.

https://wavebase.app
name: Wavebase
title: Wavebase

api_list.name: Ocean Conditions Closest to Latitude / Longitude
api_list.description:
Search for current and predicted ocean conditions closest to a given latitude/longitude.

Returned conditions include the closest point found, along with Waves, Tides and Weather conditions are the location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wavebase.p.rapidapi.com/v4/conditions/search/52.8/-4.07"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wavebase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wavebase.p.rapidapi.com/v4/conditions/search/{latitude}/{longitude}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wavebase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: XYZ Map Tiles for Ocean Conditions
api_list.description:
Wavebase Global Ocean Tiles API:

Zooms Available: 0, 1, 2
Variables Available: VHM0 (wave significant height), VTPK (Wave Peak Period), VHM0_SW1 (Primary Swell Wave Significant Height)
Dates Available: 2023120503 onwards (3 hourly steps)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wavebase.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tiles/singleband/VHM0/2023120603/0/0/0.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wavebase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wavebase.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tiles/singleband/{variable}/{datetime}/{z}/{x}/{y}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wavebase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
